lyrics:
[CHORUS]
Come on down
To the funk boutique
Try on a groove
With a funky rhythm

Yeah, yeah
Yeah, yeah

Funky rhythm
It's a funky rhythm
Funky rhythm
Funky rhythm

Yeah, yeah

Funky rhythm
It's a funky rhythm
Funky rhythm
Funky rhythm

Oh, oh, oh...

[repeat CHORUS]

Oh, oh, oh...

Mister Funk

[repeat CHORUS]

Funk boutique
F-f-f-funk boutique
Yeah, yeah

Yeah, yeah, ooh
Yeah, ooh, funky, yeah
Funky, funky

[repeat CHORUS]

Funky rhythm
It's a funky rhythm

Funk boutique
F-f-f-funk boutique

[repeat CHORUS 2x]

Funk boutique
F-f-f-funk boutique

Funk boutique
F-f-f-funk boutique
